short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forum - an open meeting facilitator to make your meetings run smoother.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Run your meetings smoother. Don't let interruptions get in the way. Or someone left behind because they couldn't ask their question. 
Use Forum to add an extra, seamless layer of communication and coordination on top of your meetings.
